name: Hot-Food
overview: Hot-Food (also known in Italy as Dentiera) is a clone of the old Atari 2600 game, Fast Food for the Commodore 64. It was developed by Volker Wiewer and published in the following: - 64'er Sonderheft 1985/03 - Game 2000 N°10 (Gennaio 1986) The game itself also plays a rendition of the Star Wars theme while the game is being played.
